channel.title: How do i code a new zone
channel.description: how do i code a new zone as in a new area like how you have edgevil varrock cammy and all them i wont to add a new place i dont really know how to explain so ill just use the term how do i make a staff only zone

item.title: How do i code a new zone
item.dc:creator: @dissarmed dissarmed
item.description:
@dissarmed wrote:

[quote=“SandScape, post:2, topic:297101”]first find the place,
basically find the cords of that place.

remeber those cords.

now make a command.

if (command.equals("staff") && playerRights >= 1) { // teleportToX = 2440;<-----put your X cord/ teleportToY = 3161;<-----put your Y cord sendMessage("You've teleported to the Staff Zone");[/quote]thanks =)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i code a new zone

item.title: How do i code a new zone
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

first find the place,
basically find the cords of that place.

remeber those cords.

now make a command.

if (command.equals("staff") && playerRights >= 1) { // teleportToX = 2440;<-----put your X cord/ teleportToY = 3161;<-----put your Y cord sendMessage("You've teleported to the Staff Zone");

Read full topic
